GP12vamp__u:5797: samīkṣya sasnehaharaṃ prāha gaccha jayāndhakam // VamP_42.7 //
GP12vamp__u:5800: tato haraḥ prāha vaco yaśasyaṃ mālinīmapi /
GP12vamp__u:5801: jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ caiva jayantīṃ cāparājitām // VamP_42.9 //
GP12vamp__u:5804: iti saṃdiśya tāḥ sarvāḥ samāruhya vṛṣaṃ vibhuḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5805: nirjagāma gṛhāt tuṣṭo jayepsuḥ śūladhṛg balī // VamP_42.11 //
GP12vamp__u:5808: raṇāya nirgacchati lokapāle maheśvare śūladhare maharṣe /
GP12vamp__u:5809: śubhāni saumyāni sumaṅgalāni jātānī cihnāni jayāya śaṃbhoḥ // VamP_42.13
GP12vamp__u:5810: śivā sthitā vāmatare 'tha bhāge prayāti cāgre svanamunnadantī /
GP12vamp__u:5813: śakuniś cāpi hārīto maunī yāti parāṅgamukhaḥ // VamP_42.15 //
GP12vamp__u:5815: śailādiṃ prāha vacanaṃ sasmitaṃ śaśiśekharaḥ // VamP_42.16 //
GP12vamp__u:5817: nandin jajo 'dya me bhāvī na kathañcit parājayaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5820: kaḥ saṃdeho mahādeva yat tvaṃ jayasi śātravān // VamP_42.18 //
GP12vamp__u:5832: gaṇāstaddānavaṃ sainyaṃ jighāṃsanti sma kopitāḥ // VamP_42.24 //
GP12vamp__u:5837: taṃ bhrāmayāno balavān nijaghāna raṇe gaṇān /
GP12vamp__u:5844: śatadhā tvagamad brahman meroḥ kūṭa ivāśaniḥ // VamP_42.30 //
GP12vamp__u:5845: parighaṃ viphalaṃ dṛṣṭvā samāyāntaṃ ca pārṣadam /
GP12vamp__u:5846: babandha bāhupāśena rāhū rakṣan hi mātulam // VamP_42.31 //
GP12vamp__u:5849: kāṣṭhavat sa dvidhā bhūto nipapāta dharātale /
GP12vamp__u:5851: sa mokṣārthe 'karod yatnaṃ na śaśāka ca nārada // VamP_42.33 //
GP12vamp__u:5852: vināyakaṃ saṃyatamīkṣya rāhuṇā kuṇḍodaro nāma gaṇeśvaro 'tha /
GP12vamp__u:5853: pragṛhya tūrṇa muśalaṃ mahātmā rāhuṃ durātmānamasau jaghāna // VamP_42.34
GP12vamp__u:5854: tato gaṇeśaḥ kalaśadhvajastu prāsena rāhuṃ hṛdaye bibheda /
GP12vamp__u:5855: ghaṭodaro vai gadayā jaghāna khaḍgena rakṣo 'dhipatiḥ sukeśī // VamP_42.35
GP12vamp__u:5858: hate tuhuṇḍe vimukhe ca rāhau gaṇeśvarāḥ krodhaviṣaṃ mumukṣavaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5861: gadāṃ samāvidhya jaghāna mūrdhni vināyakaṃ kumbhataṭe kare ca //
GP12vamp__u:5864: gaṇādhipāṃstān vimukhān sa kṛtvā balanvito vīrataro 'surendraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5866: tamāpatantaṃ bhagavān samīkṣya maheśvaraḥ śreṣṭhatamaṃ gaṇānām /
GP12vamp__u:5867: śailādimāmantrya vaco babhāṣe gacchasva daityān jahi vīra yuddha //
GP12vamp__u:5869: baliṃ sambhyetya jaghāna mūrdhni saṃmohitaḥ so 'vanimāsasāda // VamP_42.42
GP12vamp__u:5870: saṃmohitaṃ bhrātṛsutaṃ viditvā balī kujambho musalaṃ pragṛhya /
GP12vamp__u:5871: saṃbhrāmayaṃstūrṇataraṃ sa vegāt sasarja nandiṃ prati jātakopaḥ //
GP12vamp__u:5872: tamāpatantaṃ musalaṃ pragṛhya kareṇa tūrṇa bhagavān sa nandī /
GP12vamp__u:5873: jaghāna tenaiva kujambhamāhave sa prāṇahīno nipapāta bhūmau // VamP_42.44
GP12vamp__u:5874: hatvā kujambhaṃ musalena nandī vajreṇa vīraḥ śataśo jaghāna /
GP12vamp__u:5875: te vadhyamānā gaṇanāyakena duryodhanaṃ vai śaraṇaṃ prapannāḥ // VamP_42.45
GP12vamp__u:5877: prāsaṃ samāvidhya taḍitprakāśaṃ nandiṃ pracikṣepa hato 'si vai bruvan //
GP12vamp__u:5878: tamāpatantaṃ kuliśena nandī bibheda guhyaṃ piśuno yathā naraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5879: tatprāsamālakṣya tadā nikṛttaṃ saṃvarttya muṣṭiṃ gaṇamāsasāda //
GP12vamp__u:5880: tato 'sya nandī kulisena tṛrṇa śiro 'cchinat tālaphalaprakāśam /
GP12vamp__u:5881: hato 'tha bhūmau nipapāta vegād daityāśca bhītā vigatā diśo daśa //
GP12vamp__u:5882: tato hataṃ svaṃ tanayaṃ nirīkṣya hastī tadā nandinamājagāma /
GP12vamp__u:5886: parāṅmukhān vīkṣya gaṇān kumāraḥ śaktyā pṛṣatkāntha vārayitvā /
GP12vamp__u:5887: tūrṇaṃ sabhabhyetya ripuṃ samīkṣya pragṛhya śaktyā hṛdaye vibheda //
GP12vamp__u:5889: mamāra cāripṛtanā jātā bhūyaḥ parāṅmukhī // VamP_42.52 //
GP12vamp__u:5891: purato nandinaṃ kṛtvā jighāṃsanti sma dānavān // VamP_42.53 //
GP12vamp__u:5899: taṃ paṭṭiśaṃ bhrāmya jaghāna mūrdhni kārtasvaraṃ visvaramunnadantam //
GP12vamp__u:5901: babandha vīraḥ saha paṭṭiśena gaṇeśvaraṃ cāpyatha nandiṣeṇam // VamP_42.58
GP12vamp__u:5902: nandiṣeṇaṃ tathā baddhaṃ samīkṣya balināṃ varaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5910: sa tribhiḥ śaṅkarasutaiḥ pīḍyamāno jahau paṇam /
GP12vamp__u:5911: te prāptāḥ śambaraṃ tūrṇaṃ prekṣyamāṇā gaṇeśvarāḥ // VamP_42.63 //
GP12vamp__u:5915: diśo 'tha bheje devarṣe kumāraḥ sainyamardayat // VamP_42.65 //
GP12vamp__u:5917: viṣaṇṇārūpā bhayavihvalāṅgī jagāma sukraṃ śaraṇaṃ bhayārtā // VamP_42.66
GP12vamp__u:5921: andhako 'bhyetya śukraṃ tu idaṃ vacanamabravīt // VamP_43.1 //
GP12vamp__u:5924: tadiyaṃ paśya bhagavan mayā guptā varūthinī /
GP12vamp__u:5925: anāthena yathā nārī pramathairapi kālyate // VamP_43.3 //
GP12vamp__u:5928: tasmāt kuruṣva śreyo no na jīyema yathā paraiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5929: jayema ca parān yuddhe tathā tvaṃ kurtumarhasi // VamP_43.5 //
GP12vamp__u:5932: tvaddhitārtha yatiṣyāmi kariṣyāmi tava priyam // VamP_43.6 //
GP12vamp__u:5936: ye hatāḥ prathamaṃ yuddhe dānavāste samutthitāḥ // VamP_43.8 //
GP12vamp__u:5939: mahādeva vaco mahyaṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ paramādbhutam /
GP12vamp__u:5940: avicintyamasahyaṃ ca mṛtānāṃ jīvanaṃ punaḥ // VamP_43.10 //
GP12vamp__u:5942: te samujjīvitā bhūyo bhārgāveṇātha vidyāyā // VamP_43.11 //
GP12vamp__u:5948: ahaṃ taṃ saṃyamiṣyāmi yathāyogaṃ sametya hi // VamP_43.14 //
GP12vamp__u:5952: saṃrurodha tadā mārgaṃ sihasyeva paśurvane // VamP_43.16 //
GP12vamp__u:5954: sa papātātha niḥsaṃjño yayau nandī tatastvaran // VamP_43.17 //
GP12vamp__u:5961: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān brahma prāha śakrapurogamān /
GP12vamp__u:5970: rathād bhārgavamākrāmat siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // VamP_43.25 //
GP12vamp__u:5972: nipātya rakṣiṇaḥ sarvānatha śukraṃ nyavedayat // VamP_43.26 //
GP12vamp__u:5973: tamānītaṃ kaviṃ śarvaḥ prākṣipad vadane prabhuḥ /
GP12vamp__u:5974: bhārgavaṃ tvāvṛtatanuṃ jaṭhare sa nyaveśayat // VamP_43.27 //
GP12vamp__u:5979: śaṅkarāya maheśāya tryambakāya namo namaḥ // VamP_43.29 //
GP12vamp__u:5981: madanāgne kālaśatro vāmadevāya te namaḥ // VamP_43.30 //
GP12vamp__u:5983: mahādevāya śarvāya īśvarāya namo namaḥ // VamP_43.31 //
GP12vamp__u:5984: trinayana hara bhava śaṅkara umāpate jīmūtaketo śuhāgṛha śmaśānanirata bhūtivilepana sūlapāṇe paśupate gopate tatpuruṣasattma namo namaste |
GP12vamp__u:5985: itthaṃ stutaḥ kavivarema haro 'tha bhaktyā prīto varaṃ varaya dadmi tavetyuvāca /
GP12vamp__u:5986: sa prāha devavara dehi varaṃ mamādya yadvai tavaiva jaṭharāt pratinirgamo
GP12vamp__u:5988: tato haro 'kṣīṇi tadā nirudhya prāha dvijendrādya vinirgamasva /
GP12vamp__u:5989: ityuktamātro vibhunā cacāra devodare bhārgavapuṅgavastu // VamP_43.33 //
GP12vamp__u:5995: vṛkṣagulmān girīn vallyaḥ phalamūlauṣadhāni ca // VamP_43.36 //
GP12vamp__u:6000: tatrāsato bhārgavasya divyaḥ saṃvatsaro gataḥ // VamP_43.38 //
GP12vamp__u:6002: sa śrantaṃ vīkṣya cātmānaṃ nālabhannirgamaṃ vaśī /
GP12vamp__u:6006: sahasrākṣa mahādeva tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_43.40 //
GP12vamp__u:6007: namo 'stu te śaṅkara śarva śaṃbho sahasranetrāṅghribhujaṅgabhūṣaṇa /
GP12vamp__u:6008: dṛṣṭvaiva sarvān bhuvanāṃstavodare śrānto bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannaḥ //
GP12vamp__u:6009: ityevamukte vacane mahātmā śaṃbhurvacaḥ prāha tato vihasya /
GP12vamp__u:6010: nirgaccha putro 'si mamādhunā tvaṃ śiśnena bho bhārgavavaṃśacandra //
GP12vamp__u:6011: nāmnā tu śukreti carācarāstvāṃ stoṣyanti naivātra vicāramanyat /
GP12vamp__u:6012: ityevamuktvā bhagavān mumoca śiśnena śukraṃ sa ca nirjagāma // VamP_43.43
GP12vamp__u:6014: praṇamya śaṃbhuṃ sa jagāma tūrṇa mahāsurāṇāṃ balamuttamaujāḥ // VamP_43.44
GP12vamp__u:6018: yuyudhuḥ saṃkulaṃ yuddhaṃ sarva eva jayepsavaḥ // VamP_43.46 //
GP12vamp__u:6028: hastī ca kuṇḍajaṭharaṃ hlādo vīraṃ ghaṭodaram /
GP12vamp__u:6029: ete hi balināṃ śreṣṭhā dānavāḥ pramathāstathā /
GP12vamp__u:6030: saṃyodhayanti devarṣe divyābdānāṃ śatani ṣaṭ // VamP_43.51 //
GP12vamp__u:6032: vārayāmāsa balavān jambho nāma mahāsuraḥ // VamP_43.52 //
GP12vamp__u:6036: dvimūrdhā pavanaṃ somaṃ rāhurmitraṃ virūpadhṛk // VamP_43.54 //
GP12vamp__u:6037: aṣṭau ye vasavaḥ khyātā dharādyāste mahāsurān /
GP12vamp__u:6042: eka eva raṇe raudraḥ kālanemirmahāsuraḥ // VamP_43.57 //
GP12vamp__u:6048: kṛtāni ca surābdānāṃ daśatīḥ ṣaṭ mahāmune // VamP_43.60 //
GP12vamp__u:6050: tadā māyaṃ samāśritya grasantaḥ kramaśo 'vyayān // VamP_43.61 //
GP12vamp__u:6053: dṛṣṭvā śūnyaṃ giriprasthaṃ grastāṃś ca pramathāmarān /
GP12vamp__u:6056: vadanaṃ vikṛtaṃ kṛtvā muktaśastraṃ vijṛmbhire // VamP_43.64 //
GP12vamp__u:6060: śobhante padmapatrākṣā meghebhya iva vidyutaḥ // VamP_43.66 //
GP12vamp__u:6067: saṃspṛśyāpaḥ sarasvatyāṃ snātvā ca vidhinā haraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6072: nanarta bhāvagambhīraṃ dordaṇḍaṃ bhrāmayan balāt // VamP_43.72 //
GP12vamp__u:6079: svabalaṃ nirjitaṃ dṛṣṭvā matvājeyaṃ ca śaṅkam /
GP12vamp__u:6081: sunda bhrātāsi me vīra viśvasyaḥ sarvavastuṣu /
GP12vamp__u:6082: tadvadāmyadya yadvākyaṃ tacchrutvā yatkṣamaṃ kuru // VamP_43.77 //
GP12vamp__u:6084: samāsate hi hṛdaye padmākṣī śailanandinī // VamP_43.78 //
GP12vamp__u:6088: tato gatvātha bhuktvā tāṃ jeṣyāmi pramathān surān // VamP_43.80 //
GP12vamp__u:6098: taṃ dṛṣṭvā mālinīṃ prāha suyaśāṃ vijayāṃ jayām // VamP_43.85 //
GP12vamp__u:6099: jaye paśyasva devasya madarthe vigrahaṃ kṛtam /
GP12vamp__u:6106: śūlapāṇestataḥ sthitvā rūpaṃ cihnāni yatnataḥ // VamP_43.89 //
GP12vamp__u:6108: sā jñātvā dānavaṃ raudraṃ māyācchāditavigrahm // VamP_43.90 //
GP12vamp__u:6112: samādravata daiteyo yena mārgeṇa sāgamat // VamP_43.92 //
GP12vamp__u:6114: tamāpatantaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva girijā prādravad bhayāt // VamP_43.93 //
GP12vamp__u:6115: gṛhaṃ tyaktvā hayupavanaṃ sakhībhiḥ sahitā tadā /
GP12vamp__u:6117: tathāpi na śaśaṣainaṃ tapaso gopanāya tu /
GP12vamp__u:6127: pañca ṣaṭ sapta cāṣṭau vā vraghnapādairghanā iva /
GP12vamp__u:6130: halenākṛṣya caivānyān mu salena vyacūrṇayat // VamP_43.101 //
GP12vamp__u:6132: sa cādipuruṣo dhātā purāṇāḥ prapitāmahaḥ // VamP_43.102 //
GP12vamp__u:6138: dṛṣṭvā brahmaharī yuddhe ghātayantau mahāsurān // VamP_43.105 //
GP12vamp__u:6141: muktvā devaṃ gadāpāṇiṃ vimānasthaṃ ca padmajam /
GP12vamp__u:6145: vajraṃ paribhrāmya balasya mūrdhni cikṣepa he mūḍha hato 'syudīrya //
GP12vamp__u:6146: sa tasya mūrdhni pravaro 'pi vajro jagāma tūrṇaṃ hi sahasradhā mune /
GP12vamp__u:6148: taṃ cāpi jambho vimukhaṃ nirīkṣya bhūtvāgrataḥ prāha na yuktametat /
GP12vamp__u:6149: tiṣṭhasva rājāsi carācarasya na rājadharme gaditaṃ palāyanam //
GP12vamp__u:6151: upetyāha śrūyatāṃ vākyamīśa tvaṃ me nātho bhūtabhavyeśa viṣṇo //
GP12vamp__u:6153: āyudhaṃ dehi bhagavān tvāmahaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_43.112 //
GP12vamp__u:6154: tamuvāca hariḥ śakraṃ tyaktvā darpa vrajādhunā /
GP12vamp__u:6155: prārthayasvāyudhaṃ vahniṃ sa te dāsyatyasaṃśayam // VamP_43.113 //
GP12vamp__u:6159: nighnano mebalaṃ vajraṃ kṛśāno śatadhā gatam /
GP12vamp__u:6162: tamāha bhagavān vahniḥ prīto 'si tava vāsava /
GP12vamp__u:6163: yattvaṃ darpa parityajya māmeva śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // VamP_43.116 //
GP12vamp__u:6165: prādādindrāya bhagavān rocamāno divaṃ gataḥ // VamP_43.117 //
GP12vamp__u:6169: krodhaṃ cakre tadā jambha nijaghāna gajādhipam // VamP_43.119 //
GP12vamp__u:6171: nipapāta yathā śailaḥ śakravajrahataḥ purā // VamP_43.120 //
GP12vamp__u:6175: mā mā śakra patasvādya bhūtale tiṣṭha vāsava // VamP_43.122 //
GP12vamp__u:6176: sa teṣāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā yogī tasthau kṣaṇaṃ tadā /
GP12vamp__u:6177: prāha caitān kathaṃ yotsye apatraḥ śatrubhiḥ sahaḥ // VamP_43.123 //
GP12vamp__u:6179: yudhyasva tvaṃ samāruhyapreṣayiṣyāma yadā ratham // VamP_43.124 //
GP12vamp__u:6185: prāha yotsye kathaṃ yuddhe saṃyamiṣye kathaṃ hayān // VamP_43.127 //
GP12vamp__u:6187: tato 'haṃ ghātaye śatrūn nānyatheti kathañcana // VamP_43.128 //
GP12vamp__u:6193: patamānaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūḥ samakampata // VamP_43.131 //
GP12vamp__u:6195: bhāryābravīt prabho bālaṃ bahiḥ kuru yathāsukham // VamP_43.132 //
GP12vamp__u:6196: sa tu śīlāvacaḥ śrutvā kimarthamiti cāvravīt /
GP12vamp__u:6197: sā cāha śrūyatāṃ nātha daivajñaparibhāṣitam // VamP_43.133 //
GP12vamp__u:6199: yadbāhyato muniśreṣṭha tad bhaved dviguṇaṃ mune // VamP_43.134 //
GP12vamp__u:6201: nirāśaṅko bahiḥ śīghraṃ prākṣipat kṣmātale dvijaḥ // VamP_43.135 //
GP12vamp__u:6206: taṃ dṛṣṭvā devatāḥ pūjya bhāryāṃ cādbhutadarśanām /
GP12vamp__u:6207: prāha tattvaṃ na vindāmi yat pṛcchāmi vadasva tat // VamP_43.138 //
GP12vamp__u:6209: bhāgyāni cāsya yaccoktaṃ karmatat kathayādhunā // VamP_43.139 //
GP12vamp__u:6210: sābravīnnādya te vakṣye vadiṣyāmi punaḥ prabho /
GP12vamp__u:6211: so 'bravīd vada me 'dyaiva nocennāśnāmi bhojanam // VamP_43.140 //
GP12vamp__u:6212: sā prāha śrūyatāṃ brahman vadiṣye vacanaṃ hitam /
GP12vamp__u:6213: kātareṇādya yatpṛṣṭaṃ bhāvyaḥ kārurayaṃ ki // VamP_43.141 //
GP12vamp__u:6214: ityuktāvati vākye tu bāla eva tvecetanaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6215: jagāma sāhyaṃ śakrasya kartuṃ sautyaviśāradaḥ // VamP_43.142 //
GP12vamp__u:6218: gandharvatejasā yuktaḥ śiśuḥ śakraṃ sametya hi /
GP12vamp__u:6219: provācaihyehi deveśa priyo yantā bhavāmi te // VamP_43.144 //
GP12vamp__u:6220: tacchratvāsya hariḥ prāha kasya putro 'si bālaka /
GP12vamp__u:6221: saṃyantāsi kathaṃ cāśvān saṃśayaḥ pratibhāti me // VamP_43.145 //
GP12vamp__u:6224: tatchravā bhagavāñchakraḥ khaṃ bheje yogināṃ varaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6229: praviśan dadṛśe śrīmān patitaṃ kārsukaṃ mahat // VamP_43.149 //
GP12vamp__u:6233: namaskṛtya śaraṃ cāpe sādhijye viniyojayat // VamP_43.151 //
GP12vamp__u:6236: ākāśaṃ vidiśaḥ pṛthvīṃ diśaśca sa śarotkaraiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6238: gajo viddho hayo bhinnaḥ pṛthivyāṃ patito rathaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6239: mahāmātro dharāṃ prāptaḥ sadyaḥ sīdañcharāturaḥ // VamP_43.154 //
GP12vamp__u:6242: taṃ śakrabāṇabhihataṃ durāsadaṃ sainyaṃ samālakṣya tadā kujambhaḥ /

GP12vamp__u:6681: sa samārādhya tapasā bhāskaraṃ tejasāṃ nidhim /
GP12vamp__u:6682: avāpa kanyāṃ suratiṃ tāṃ pragṛhya gṛhaṃ yayau // VamP_46.64 //
GP12vamp__u:6683: tasyāṃ pitṛgṛhe brahman vasantyāṃ sa pitā mṛtaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6684: sāpi duḥkhaparītāṅgīṃ svāṃ tanuṃ tyaktumudyatā // VamP_46.65 //
GP12vamp__u:6689: tāṃ mṛtāmṛṣayo dṛṣṭvā kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭeti vādinaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6691: te ca mātrā vinābhūtā rurudustān pitāmahaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6696: saptasārasvate tīrthe so 'tapyata mahat tapaḥ // VamP_46.71 //
GP12vamp__u:6697: vighnārthaṃ tasya tuṣitā devāḥ saṃpreṣayan vapum /
GP12vamp__u:6698: sā cābhyetya nadītīre kṣobhayāmāsa bhāminī // VamP_46.72 //
GP12vamp__u:6701: gaccha labdhāsi mūḍhe tvaṃ pāpasyāsya mahat phalam /
GP12vamp__u:6703: evaṃ śaptvā ṛṣiḥ śrīmān jagāmātha svamāśramam /
GP12vamp__u:6704: sarasvatībhyaḥ saptabhayaḥ sapta vai maruto 'bhavan // VamP_46.75 //
GP12vamp__u:6705: etat tavoktā marutaḥ purā yathā jātā viyadvyāptikarā maharṣe /
GP12vamp__u:6706: yeṣāṃ śrute janmani pāpahānirbhavecca dharmābhyudayo mahān vai //
GP12vamp__u:6712: didṛkṣavaḥ samāyātāḥ samayāḥ sarva eva hi // VamP_47.2 //
GP12vamp__u:6714: papraccha kulajān sarvān kiṃnu śreyaskaraṃ mama // VamP_47.3 //
GP12vamp__u:6716: yat te śreyaskaraṃ karma yadasmākaṃ hitaṃ tathā // VamP_47.4 //
GP12vamp__u:6720: pratyakṣaṃ dānavendrāṇāṃ nakhaistaṃ hi vyadārayat // VamP_47.6 //
GP12vamp__u:6723: tathā tava pitṛvyo 'pi jambhaḥ śakreṇa ghātitaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6724: kujambho viṣṇunā cāpi pratyakṣaṃ paśuvat tava // VamP_47.8 //
GP12vamp__u:6725: śambhuḥ pāko mahendreṇa bhrātā tava sudarśanaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6726: virocanastava pitā nihataḥ kathayāmi te // VamP_47.9 //
GP12vamp__u:6727: śrutvā go6kṣayaṃ brahman kṛta śakreṇa dānavaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6732: sainyasya madhye ca baliḥ kālanemiśca ṣṛṣṭhataḥ // VamP_47.12 //
GP12vamp__u:6734: prayāti dakṣiṇaṃ ghoraṃ tārakākhyo bhayaṅkaraḥ // VamP_47.13 //

GP12vamp__u:6743: ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyā viśve 'śvinau tathā /
GP12vamp__u:6748: samāruhyādravan sarve yato daityabalaṃ sthitam // VamP_47.20 //
GP12vamp__u:6749: etasmin viṣṇuḥ suraśreṣṭha adhiruhya samabhyagāt // VamP_47.21 //
GP12vamp__u:6751: vavanda mūrdhnāvanataḥ saha sarvaiḥ surottamaiḥ // VamP_47.22 //
GP12vamp__u:6759: nirvṛkṣe pakṣirahite jāto devāsuro raṇaḥ // VamP_47.26 //
GP12vamp__u:6763: saṃdyānuraktaḥ sadṛśo meghaḥ khe suratāpasa // VamP_47.28 //
GP12vamp__u:6764: tadāsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ na prājñāyata kiñcana /

GP12vamp__u:6766: tato viśasano raudro daityānāṃ daivataiḥ saha /
GP12vamp__u:6769: abhidravanti sahitāḥ samaṃ skandena dhīmatā // VamP_47.31 //
GP12vamp__u:6773: nirjitāḥ samare daityaiḥ samaṃ skandena nārada // VamP_47.33 //
GP12vamp__u:6777: daiteyāḥ śaraṇaṃ jagmuḥ kālanemiṃ mahāsurām // VamP_47.35 //
GP12vamp__u:6778: tebhyaḥ sa cābhayaṃ dattvā jñātvājeyaṃ ca mādhavam /
GP12vamp__u:6780: yaṃ yaṃ kareṇa spṛśati devaṃ yakṣaṃ sakinnaram /
GP12vamp__u:6781: taṃ tamādāya cikṣepa vistṛte vadane balī // VamP_47.37 //
GP12vamp__u:6782: saṃrambhād dānavendro vimṛdati ditijaiḥ saṃyuto devasainyaṃ sendraṃ sārka sacandraṃ karacaraṇanakhairaskṣatrahīno 'pi vegāt /
GP12vamp__u:6785: taṃ dṛṣṭvā varddhamānaṃ ripamatibalinaṃ devagandharvamukhyāḥ siddhāḥsādhyāśvimukhyā bhayataraladṛśaḥ prādravan dikṣu sarve /
GP12vamp__u:6786_1: tānitthaṃprekṣya daityān mayabalipuragān kālanemipradhānān bāṇairākṛṣya śārṅga tvanavaratamurobhedibirvajrakalpaiḥ
GP12vamp__u:6787: kopādāraktadṛṣṭiḥ sarathagajahayān dṛṣṭinirdhūtavīryān nārācakhyaiḥ supuṅkhairjalad iva girīn chādayāmāsa viṣṇuḥ // VamP_47.40 //
GP12vamp__u:6789: prārambe dānavendraṃ śatavadanamatho preṣayan kālanemiṃ sa prāyād devasainyaprabhumamitabalaṃ keśavaṃ lokanātham // VamP_47.41 //
GP12vamp__u:6790: taṃ dṛṣṭvā śataśīrṣamudyatagadaṃ śailendraśṛṅgākṛtiṃ viṣṇuḥ śārṅgamapāsya satvaramatho jagrāha cakraṃ kare /
GP12vamp__u:6791: so 'pyenaṃ prasamīkṣya daityaviṭapapracchedanaṃ māninaṃ provācātha vihasya taṃ ca suciraṃ meghasvano dānavaḥ // VamP_47.42 //
GP12vamp__u:6792: ayaṃ sa danuputrasainyavitrāsakṛdriṣuḥ paramakopitaḥ sa madhorvighātakṛt /
GP12vamp__u:6793: hiraṇyanayanāntakaḥ kusumapūjāratiḥ kva yāti mama dṛṣṭigocare nipatitaḥ khalaḥ // VamP_47.43
GP12vamp__u:6794: yadyeṣa saṃprati mamāhavamabhyuṣaiti nṛnaṃ na yāti nilayaṃ nijamambujākṣaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6796: ityevamuktvā madhusūdanaṃ vai sa kālanemiḥ sphuritādharoṣṭhaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6797: gadāṃ khagendropari jātakopo mumoca śaile kuliśaṃ yathendraḥ // VamP_47.45
GP12vamp__u:6799: cakreṇa ciccheda sudurgatasya manorathaṃ pūrvakṛtena karma // VamP_47.46
GP12vamp__u:6800: gadāṃ chittvā dānavābhyāśametya bhujau pīnau saṃpraciccheda vegāt /
GP12vamp__u:6803: chittvā nipātayāmāsa pakvaṃ tālaphalaṃ yathā // VamP_47.48 //
GP12vamp__u:6806: taṃ vainateyo 'pyupasā khagottmo nipātayāmāsa mune dharaṇyām /
GP12vamp__u:6807: yathāmbarād bāhuśiraḥ praṇaṣṭabalaṃ mahendraḥ kuliśena bhūmyām //
GP12vamp__u:6812: saṃnivṛtte tato bāṇe dānavāḥ satvaraṃ punaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6813: nivṛttā devatānāṃ ca saśastrā yuddhalālasāḥ // VamP_48.1 //
GP12vamp__u:6815: prāhāmantrya surān sarvān yudhyadhvaṃ vigatajvarāḥ // VamP_48.2 //
GP12vamp__u:6818: mādhavaṃ gatamājñāya śukro balimuvāca ha/ govindena murāstyaktāstvaṃ jayasvādhunā bale sa purohitavākyena prīto yāte janārdane /
GP12vamp__u:6823: yodhayāmāsa balāvān surāṇāṃ ca varūchinīm // VamP_48.7 //
GP12vamp__u:6825: vipāko vikṣaraḥ sainyaṃ te 'pi devānupādravan // VamP_48.8 //
GP12vamp__u:6827: gate janārdane deve prāyaśo vimukhyābhavan // VamP_48.9 //
GP12vamp__u:6839: devāsuro 'bhūt saṃgrāmo yatra śakro 'pyabhūd baliḥ // VamP_48.15 //
GP12vamp__u:6840: pātālāḥ sapta tasyāsn vaśe lokatrayaṃ tathā /
GP12vamp__u:6842: svarge svayaṃ nivasati bhuñjan bhogān sudarlabhān /
GP12vamp__u:6847: sasmāra manasā brahman prahlādaṃ svapitāmaham // VamP_48.19 //
GP12vamp__u:6854: laṃ baliḥ prāha bhostāta tvatprasādāt surā mayā /
GP12vamp__u:6855: nirjitāḥ śakrarājyaṃ ca hṛtaṃ vīryabalānmayā // VamP_48.23 //
GP12vamp__u:6857: trailokyarājyaṃ bhuñja tvaṃ mayi bhṛtye puraḥsthite // VamP_48.24 //
GP12vamp__u:6858: etāvatā puṇyayutaḥ syāmahaṃ tāta yat svayam /
GP12vamp__u:6860: na sā pālayato rājyaṃ dhṛtirbhavati sattama /
GP12vamp__u:6861: yā dhṛtirguruśuśruṣāṃ kurvato jāyate vibho // VamP_48.26 //
GP12vamp__u:6864: mayā kṛtaṃ rājyamakaṇṭakaṃ purā praśāsitā bhūḥ suhṛdo 'nupūjitāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6865: dattaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ janināstathātmajāḥ sthito bale samprati yogasādhakaḥ //
GP12vamp__u:6867: evaṃ bhava gurūṇāṃ tvaṃ sadā suśrūṣaṇe rataḥ // VamP_48.29 //
GP12vamp__u:6869: śākre siṃhāsane brahman baliṃ tūrṇaṃ nyaveśayat // VamP_48.30 //
GP12vamp__u:6873: prahlādaṃ prāha vacanaṃ meghagambhīrayā girā // VamP_48.32 //
GP12vamp__u:6880: yadāyatyāṃ kṣamaṃ rājan yaddhitaṃ bhuvanasya ca /
GP12vamp__u:6881: avirodhena dharmasya arthasyopārjanaṃ ca yat // VamP_48.36 //
GP12vamp__u:6883: paratreha ca yacchreyaḥ putra tatkarma āraca // VamP_48.37 //
GP12vamp__u:6885: yatā nāyaśaso yogastathā kuru mahāmate // VamP_48.38 //
GP12vamp__u:6888: kulajo vyasane magnaḥ sakhā cārthabahiḥ kṛtaḥ /

GP12vamp__u:6890: tasmād yathaite nivasanti putra rājyasthitasyeha kulodgatādyāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6891: tathā yatsvāmalasattvaceṣṭa yathā yaśasvī bhavitāsi loke // VamP_48.41 //
GP12vamp__u:6894: tasmād dvijāgryāḥ śrutiśāstrayuktā narādhipāṃste kratubhirdvijendrā yajñāgnidhūmena nṛpasya śāntiḥ // VamP_48.43 //
GP12vamp__u:6905: tasmād varṇāḥ svadharmasthāstvayā kāryāḥ sadā bale /

GP12vamp__u:6908: tato yadājñāpayase kariṣye itthaṃ baliḥ prāha vaco maharṣe // VamP_48.50

GP12vamp__u:6913: kalistadā dharmayutaṃ jagad dṛṣṭvā kṛte yathā /

GP12vamp__u:6915: gatvā sa dadṛśe devaṃ sendrairdevaiḥ samanvitam /

GP12vamp__u:6918: mama svabhāvo balinā nāśito devasattama // VamP_49.4 //
GP12vamp__u:6919: taṃ prāha bhagavān yogī svabhāvaṃ jagato 'pi hi /

GP12vamp__u:6921: paśyasva tiṣya devendraṃ varuṇaṃ ca samārutam /
GP12vamp__u:6922: bhāskaro 'pi hi dīnatvaṃ prayāto hi balād baleḥ // VamP_49.6 //
GP12vamp__u:6923: na tasya kaścit trailokye pratiṣeddhāsti karmaṇaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6924: ṛte sahasraṃ śirasaṃ hariṃ daśaśatāṅghrikam // VamP_49.7 //
GP12vamp__u:6925: ma bhūmiṃ ca tathā nākaṃ rājyaṃ lakṣmīṃ yaso 'vyayaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6928: dīnān dṛṣṭvā sa śakrādīn vibhītakavanaṃ gataḥ // VamP_49.9 //
GP12vamp__u:6932: dayā dānaṃ tvānṛśaṃsyaṃ śuśruṣā yajñakarma ca // VamP_49.11 //
GP12vamp__u:6934: balinā balavān brahman tiṣyo 'pi hi kṛtaḥ kṛtaḥ // VamP_49.12 //
GP12vamp__u:6940: papraccha kāsi māṃ brūhi kenāsyarthena cāgatā // VamP_49.15 //
GP12vamp__u:6942: bale śṛṇuṣva yāsmi tvāmāyātā mahiṣi balāt // VamP_49.16 //
GP12vamp__u:6944: tena tyaktastu maghavā tato 'haṃ tvāmihāgatā // VamP_49.17 //
GP12vamp__u:6954: yā sā śvetāmbharā śvetā sattvāḍhyā kuñjarasthitā // VamP_49.22 //
GP12vamp__u:6956: yā raktā raktavasanā vājisthā rajasānvitā // VamP_49.23 //
GP12vamp__u:6957: tāṃ prādād devarājāya maneva tatsameṣu ca /
GP12vamp__u:6958: pītāmbarā yā subhagā rathasthā kanakaprabhā // VamP_49.24 //
GP12vamp__u:6959: prajāpatibhyastāṃ prādāt śukrāya ca viśaḥsu ca /
GP12vamp__u:6961: sā dānavān naiṛtāṃś ca śūdrān vidyādharānapi /
GP12vamp__u:6962: viprādyāḥ śvetarūpāṃ tāṃ kathayanti sarasvatīm // VamP_49.26 //
GP12vamp__u:6963: stuvanti brahmaṇā sārdhaṃ makhe mantrādibhiḥ sadā /
GP12vamp__u:6964: kṣatriyā raktavarṇāṃ tāṃ jayaśrīmiti śaṃsire // VamP_49.27 //
GP12vamp__u:6966: vaiśyāstāṃ pītavasanāṃ kanakāṅgīṃ sadaiva hi // VamP_49.28 //
GP12vamp__u:6968: śūdrāstāṃ nīlavarṇāṅgīṃ stuvanti ca subhaktitaḥ // VamP_49.29 //
GP12vamp__u:6969: śriyā devīti nāmnā tāṃ samaṃ daityaiśca rākṣasaiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6970: evaṃ vibhaktāstā nāryastena devena cakriṇā // VamP_49.30 //
GP12vamp__u:6977: oṣadhyaḥ paśavaḥ pītā mahānīlo nidhiḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6979: anyeṣāmapi saṃhartrī nīlā śaṅkho nidhiḥ sthitaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:6980: etāsu saṃsthitānāṃ ca yāni rūpāṇi dānava /
GP12vamp__u:6981: bhavanti suruṣāṇāṃ vai tān vibodha vadāmi te // VamP_49.35 //
GP12vamp__u:6990: ityevaṃ kathitastubhyaṃ teṣāṃ dānava nirṇayaḥ // VamP_49.40 //
GP12vamp__u:6993: samāśrayāmi śauryaḍhyaṃ na ca klībaṃ kathañcana /
GP12vamp__u:6994: na cāsti bhavatastulyo trailokye 'pi balādhikaḥ // VamP_49.42 //
GP12vamp__u:6995: tvayā balavibhūtyā hi prītirme janitā dhruvā /
GP12vamp__u:6996: yattvayā yudhi vikramya devarājo vinirjitaḥ // VamP_49.43 //
GP12vamp__u:6997: ato mama parā prītirjātā dānava śāśvatī /
GP12vamp__u:6998: dṛṣṭvā te paramaṃ sattvaṃ sarvebhyo 'pi balādhikam // VamP_49.44 //
GP12vamp__u:7003: vijitaṃ vikramād yena trailokyaṃ vai parairhṛtam /
GP12vamp__u:7004: ityevamuktvā vacanaṃ dānavaindraṃ tadā balim // VamP_49.47 //
GP12vamp__u:7006: tasyāṃ cātha praviṣṭāyāṃ vidhavā iva yoṣitaḥ // VamP_49.48 //
GP12vamp__u:7008: prabhā matiḥ śramā bhūtirvidyā nītirdayā tathā // VamP_49.49 //
GP12vamp__u:7011: tāḥ sarvā balimāśritya vyaśrāmyanta yathāsukham // VamP_49.50 //
GP12vamp__u:7013: yajvā tapasvī mṛdureva satyavāk dātā vibhartā svajanābhigoptā //
GP12vamp__u:7014: triviṣṭapaṃ śāsati dānavendre nāsīn kṣudhārto malino na dīnaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:7015: sadojjvalo dharmarato 'tha dāntaḥ kāmopabhoktā manujo 'pi jātaḥ //
GP12vamp__u:7019: jagāma brahmasadanaṃ saha devaiḥ śacīpatiḥ // VamP_50.1 //
GP12vamp__u:7021: ṛṣibhiḥ sārdhamāsīnaṃ pitaraṃ svaṃ ca kaśyapam // VamP_50.2 //
GP12vamp__u:7022: tato nanāma śirasā śakraḥ suragaṇaiḥ saha /
GP12vamp__u:7023: brahmāṇaṃ kaśyapaṃ caiva tāṃśca sarvāstapodhanān // VamP_50.3 //
GP12vamp__u:7025: pitāmaha hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ balinā balinā mama // VamP_50.4 //
GP12vamp__u:7026: brahmā provāca śakraitad bhujyate svakṛtaṃ phalam /
GP12vamp__u:7027: śakraḥ papraccha bho brūhi kiṃ mayā duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam // VamP_50.5 //
GP12vamp__u:7029: dityudarāt tvayā garbhaḥ kṛtto vai bahudhā balāt // VamP_50.6 //
GP12vamp__u:7030: pitaraṃ prāha devendraḥ sa māturdeṣato vibho /
GP12vamp__u:7031: kṛntanaṃ prāptavān garbho yadaśaucā hi sā bhavat // VamP_50.7 //
GP12vamp__u:7033: gatastato vinihato dāso 'pi kuliśena bho // VamP_50.8 //
GP12vamp__u:7035: vināśaṃ pāpmano brūhi prāyaścittaṃ vibho mama // VamP_50.9 //
GP12vamp__u:7037: hitaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ śakrasyāpi viśeṣataḥ // VamP_50.10 //
GP12vamp__u:7039: taṃ prapadyasva śaraṇaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati // VamP_50.11 //
GP12vamp__u:7040: sahasrākṣo 'pi vacanaṃ gurūṇāṃ sa niśamya vai /
GP12vamp__u:7043: ityevamuktaḥ surarāḍ viriñcinā marīciputreṇa ca kaśyapena /
GP12vamp__u:7046: suśasthalāt pūrvata eva viśruto vasoḥ purāt piścimato 'vatasthe //
GP12vamp__u:7047: pūrvaṃ gayena nṛvarema yatra yaṣṭo 'śvamedhaḥ śatakṛtsadakṣiṇaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:7049: tathā purā duryajanaḥ surāsuraiḥ khyāto mahāmedha iti prasiddhaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:7050: yatrāsya cakre bhagavān murāriḥ vāstavyamavyaktatanuḥ khamūrtimat /
GP12vamp__u:7051: khyātiṃ jagāmātha gadādhareti mahāghavṛkṣasya śitaḥ kuṭhāraḥ // VamP_50.16
GP12vamp__u:7053: sakṛt pitṛn yatra ca saṃprapūjya bhaktyā tvananyena hi cetasaiva /
GP12vamp__u:7060: tapastepe sahasrākṣaḥ stuvan devaṃ gadādharam // VamP_50.20 //

GP12vamp__u:8362: sraṣṭṛtve saṃsthitaṃ sṛṣṭau praṇato 'smi sanātanam // VamP_59.80 //

GP12vamp__u:8740: ādyaṃ mātsyaṃ mahadrupaṃ saṃsthitaṃ mānase hrade /

GP12vamp__u:8841: tataḥ samāgaccati vāsudeve mahī cakampe girayaca celuḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8843: tataḥ samāgaccati vāsudeve mahī cakampe girayaśca celuḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8844: kṣubdhāḥ samudrā divi ṛkṣamaṇḍalo babhau viparyastagatirmaharṣe //

GP12vamp__u:8846: yathā pradagdho 'smi maheśvareṇa kiṃ māṃ na saṃdhakṣyayati vāsudevaḥ //

GP12vamp__u:8867: āyāte vāsudeve vada mama bhagavan dharmakāmarthattattvaṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ kiṃ ca deyaṃ maṇikankamatho bhūgajāśvādikaṃ vā /
GP12vamp__u:8868: kiṃ vā vācyaṃ murārernijahitamathavā taddhitaṃ vā prayuḍhañje tathyaṃ pathyaṃpriyabhomama vadaśubhadantatkariṣye na cānyat // VamP_64.11 //
GP12vamp__u:8870: tad vākyaṃ bhārgavaṃ śrutvā daityanātheritaṃ varam /
GP12vamp__u:8872: tvāyā kṛtā yajñabhujo 'surendrā bahiṣkṛtā ye śrutidṛṣṭamārge /
GP12vamp__u:8873: śrutipramāṇaṃ makhabhojino bahiḥ surāstadarthaṃ harir abhyupaiti //
GP12vamp__u:8874: tasyādhvaraṃ daityasamāgatasya kāryaṃ hi kiṃ māṃ paripṛcchase yat /
GP12vamp__u:8875: kāryaṃ na deyaṃ hi vibho tṛṇāgraṃ yadadhvare bhūkanakādikaṃ vā //
GP12vamp__u:8876: vācyaṃ tathā sāma nirarthakaṃ vibho kaste varaṃ dātumalaṃ hi śaknuyāt /
GP12vamp__u:8879: mayā na coktaṃ vacanaṃ hi bhārgava na cāsti mahyaṃ na ca dātumutsahe /
GP12vamp__u:8880: samāgate 'pyayarthini hīnavṛtte janārdane lokapatau kathaṃ tu //
GP12vamp__u:8881: evaṃ ca śruyate ślokaḥ satāṃ kathayatāṃ vibho /
GP12vamp__u:8883: dṛśyate hi tathā tacca satyaṃ brāhmaṇasattama // VamP_64.17 //
GP12vamp__u:8886: kiṃ vā tvayā dvijaśreṣṭha paurāṇī na śrutā kathā /

GP12vamp__u:8900: taṃ jātaṃ brāhmaṇī putraṃ jaḍaṃ mūkaṃ tvacakṣuṣam /

GP12vamp__u:8908: sābravīt rākṣasapate mayā sthāpya nijaṃ śiśum /

GP12vamp__u:8921: sa cāpi brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhaḥ samapaśyata taṃ śiśum // VamP_64.35 //

GP12vamp__u:8925: ko 'pyaṭasmākaṃ chalayituṃ surūpī bhuvi saṃsthitaḥ // VamP_64.37 //

GP12vamp__u:8943: niśākaro jaḍatayā na papāṭheti naḥ śrutam // VamP_64.46 //
GP12vamp__u:8944: taṃ bāndhavāśca pitarau mātā bhrātā gurustathā /
GP12vamp__u:8945: paryanindaṃstathā ye ca janā malayavāsinaḥ // VamP_64.47 //
GP12vamp__u:8946: tataḥ sa pitrā kruddhena kṣiptaḥ kūpe nirūdake /
GP12vamp__u:8949: tasya mātāgamat kūpaṃ tamandhaṃ śilayācitam // VamP_64.49 //
GP12vamp__u:8951: tasya mātāgamat kūpaṃ tamandhaṃ śilayācitam // VamP_64.50 //
GP12vamp__u:8952: sā dṛṣṭāvā nicitaṃ kūpaṃ śilayā girikalpayā /
GP12vamp__u:8953: uccaiḥ provāca keneyaṃ kūpopari śilā kṛtā // VamP_64.51 //
GP12vamp__u:8954: kūpāntasthaḥ sa tāṃ vāṇīṃ śrutvā māturniśākaraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8955: prāha pradattā pitrā me kūpopari śilā tviyam // VamP_64.52 //
GP12vamp__u:8957: so 'pyāha tava putro 'smi niśākareti viśrutaḥ // VamP_64.53 //
GP12vamp__u:8958: sābravīt tanayo mahyaṃ nāmnā khyāto divākaraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:8959: niśākareti nāmnāho na kaścit tanayo 'sti me // VamP_64.54 //
GP12vamp__u:8961: sā śrutvā tāṃ śilāṃsubhraḥ samutkṣipyāntayo 'śripat // VamP_64.55 //

GP12vamp__u:8965: kathayāmāsa tatsarvaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ svasutasya ca // VamP_64.57 //
GP12vamp__u:8967: noktavān yadbhavān pūrvaṃ mahatkautūhalaṃ mama // VamP_64.58 //
GP12vamp__u:8969: prāha putro 'dbhutaṃ vākyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā // VamP_64.59 //
GP12vamp__u:8975: mokṣaśāstraṃ paraṃ tāta setihāsaśrutiṃ tathā // VamP_64.62 //
GP12vamp__u:8985: araṇye mṛgahā pāpaḥ saṃjāto 'haṃ mṛgādhipaḥ // VamP_64.67 //
GP12vamp__u:8987: narādhipena vibhunā nītaśca nagaraṃ nijam // VamP_64.68 //

GP12vamp__u:8995: yathaiva dharmaśāstrāṇi tathāhamavadaṃ ca tām // VamP_64.72 //
GP12vamp__u:8997: cittaṃ harasi me bhīru kokilā dhvaninā yathā // VamP_64.73 //
GP12vamp__u:9005: tasmādudghāṭaya dvāraṃ māṃ bandhācca vimocaya // VamP_64.77 //
GP12vamp__u:9007: udghāṭite tato dvāre nirgato 'haṃ bahiḥ śraṇāt // VamP_64.78 //
GP12vamp__u:9009: sā gṛhītā ca nṛpaterbhāryā ramitumicchatā // VamP_64.79 //
GP12vamp__u:9015: dṛḍhaṃ vṛkṣe samudbdhya ghātayanta tapodhana // VamP_64.82 //
GP12vamp__u:9019: tatrāpi sarvavijñānaṃ pratyabhāsat tato mama // VamP_64.84 //
GP12vamp__u:9025: ityevamuktā sā bhartrā tanvī māmadhiruhya ca // VamP_64.87 //
GP12vamp__u:9027: tator'dhapathi sā tanvī matpṛṣṭhādavaruhya vai // VamP_64.88 //

GP12vamp__u:9033: protkṣipya yaṣṭiṃ māṃ brahman samādhāvat tvarānvitaḥ // VamP_64.91 //
GP12vamp__u:9034: tad bhayāt tāṃ parityajya pradruto dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ /

GP12vamp__u:9047: nāmnā candrāvalī nāma samudghāṭyātha pañjaram // VamP_64.98 //
GP12vamp__u:9050: cakāropari pīnābhyāṃ stanābhyāṃ sā hi māṃ tataḥ // VamP_64.99 //
GP12vamp__u:9051: tato 'haṃ kṛtavān bhāvaṃ tasyāṃ vilasituṃ plavan /

GP12vamp__u:9071: jātiṃ yadā paurvikīṃ tu smarate tāta mānavaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9072: tadā sa tebhyaḥ pāpebhyo śubhavardhanāya pāpakṣayāyātha mune hyaraṇyam /
GP12vamp__u:9074: tasmād gamiṣye śubhavardhanāya pāpakṣayāyātha mune hyaraṇyam /
GP12vamp__u:9077: ityevamuktvā sa niśākarastadā praṇamya mātāpitarau maharṣe /
GP12vamp__u:9078: jagāma puṇyaṃ sadanaṃ murāreḥ khyātaṃ badaryāśramamādyamīḍyam //
GP12vamp__u:9080: tasmācca pūrvaṃ dvijavarya vai mayā abhyastamāsīnnanu te bravīmi //
GP12vamp__u:9081: dānaṃ tapo vādhyayanaṃ maharṣe steyaṃ mahāpātakamagnidāham /
GP12vamp__u:9082: jñānāni caivābyasaṃtāṃ hi pūrvaṃ bhavanti dharmārthaśāṃsi nātha //
GP12vamp__u:9084: ityevamuktvā balavān sa śukraṃ daityeśvaraḥ svaḥ gurumīśitāram /
GP12vamp__u:9090: oṅkārapūrvāḥ śrutayo makhe 'smin tiṣṭhanti rūpeṇa tapodhanānām /
GP12vamp__u:9091: yajño 'śvamedhaḥ pravaraḥ kratūnāṃ mukhyastathā satriṣu daityanāthaḥ //
GP12vamp__u:9097: provāca bhagavan brūhi kiṃ dadmi tava mānada // VamP_65.5 //
GP12vamp__u:9099: vihasya suciraṃ kālaṃ bharadvājamavekṣya ca // VamP_65.6 //
GP12vamp__u:9101: na sa dhārayate bhūmyāṃ pārakyāṃ jātavedasam // VamP_65.7 //
GP12vamp__u:9105: bāṇaṃ ca tanayaṃ vīkṣya idaṃ vacanamabravīt // VamP_65.9 //
GP12vamp__u:9106: na kevalaṃ pramāṇena vāmano 'yaṃ laghuḥ priye /
GP12vamp__u:9107: yena kramatrayaṃ maurkhyād yācate buddhito 'pi ca // VamP_65.10 //
GP12vamp__u:9108: prayo vidhātālpadhiyāṃ narāṇāṃ bahiṣkṛtānāṃ ca mahānubhāgyaiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9109: dhanādikaṃ bhūri na vai dadāti yatheha viṣṇorna bahuprayāsaḥ // VamP_65.11
GP12vamp__u:9111: mayi dātari yaścāyamadya yācet padatrayam // VamP_65.12 //
GP12vamp__u:9112: ityevamuktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā bhūyo 'pyuvācātha hariṃ danūjaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9113: yācasva viṣṇo gajavājibhūmiṃ dāsīhiraṇyaṃ yadabhīpsitaṃ ca // VamP_65.13
GP12vamp__u:9114: bhavān yācayitā viṣṇo ahaṃ dātā jagatpatiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9115: dāturyācayiturlajjā kathaṃ na syāt padatraye // VamP_65.14 //
GP12vamp__u:9116: rasātalaṃ vā vṛthivīṃ bhuvaṃ nākamathāpi vā /
GP12vamp__u:9117: etabhyaḥ katamaṃ dadyāṃ sthānaṃ yācasva vāmana // VamP_65.15 //
GP12vamp__u:9120: etāvatā tvahaṃ cārthī dehi rājan padatrayam // VamP_65.16 //
GP12vamp__u:9123: pāṇau tu patite toye divyaṃ rūpaṃ cakāra ha /
GP12vamp__u:9126: satyaṃ tapo jānuyugme ūrubhyāṃ merumandarau // VamP_65.19 //
GP12vamp__u:9128: liṅge sthito manmathaśca vṛṣaṇābhyāṃ prajāpatiḥ // VamP_65.20 //
GP12vamp__u:9130: valiṣu triṣu nadyaśca yajñāstu jaṭhare sthitāḥ // VamP_65.21 //
GP12vamp__u:9132: pṛṣṭhasthā vasavo devāḥ skandhau rudrairadhiṣaṭhitau // VamP_65.22 //
GP12vamp__u:9133: bāhavaśca diśaḥ sarvā vasavo 'ṣṭau kare smṛtāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9134: hṛdaye saṃsthito brahmā kuliśo hṛdayāsthiṣu // VamP_65.23 //
GP12vamp__u:9137: mukhe tu sāgnayo viprāḥ saṃskārā daśanacchadāḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9140: śvāsastho mātariśvā ca marutaḥ sarvasaṃdhiṣu // VamP_65.26 //
GP12vamp__u:9142: candrādityau ca nayane pakṣmasthāḥ kṛttikādayaḥ // VamP_65.27 //
GP12vamp__u:9144: tārakā romakūpebhyo romāṇi ca maharṣayaḥ // VamP_65.28 //
GP12vamp__u:9155: kuṭilā viṣṇupāde tu sametya kuṭilā tataḥ // VamP_65.33 //
GP12vamp__u:9158: bhagavānapyasaṃpūrṇe tṛtīye tu krame vibhuḥ // VamP_65.34 //
GP12vamp__u:9161: tvaṃ pūraya padaṃ tanme no ced bandhaṃ pratīccha bhoḥ // VamP_65.35 //
GP12vamp__u:9165: kṛtvā mahīmalpatarāṃ jagatpate svāyaṃbhuvādibhuvanāni vai ṣaṭ /
GP12vamp__u:9166: kathaṃ baliṃ prārthayase suvistṛtāṃ yāṃ prāgbhavān no vipulāmathākarot //
GP12vamp__u:9167: vibho sahī yāvatīyaṃ tvayādya sṛṣṭacā sametā bhuvanāntarālaiḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9168: dattā ca tātena hi tāvatīyaṃ kiṃ vākchalenaiṣa nibadhyate 'dya //
GP12vamp__u:9169: yā naiva śakya bhavatā hi pūrituṃ kathaṃ vitanyād ditijeśvaro 'sau /
GP12vamp__u:9170: śaktastu saṃpūjayituṃ murāre prasīda mā bandhanamādiśasva // VamP_65.39 //
GP12vamp__u:9171: proktaṃ śrutau bhavatāpīśa vākyaṃ dānaṃ pātre bhavate saukhyadāyi /
GP12vamp__u:9172: deśe supuṇye varade yacca kāle taccāśeṣaṃ dṛśyate cakrapāṇe // VamP_65.40
GP12vamp__u:9173: dānaṃ bhūmiḥ sarvakāmapradeyaṃ bhavān pātraṃ devadevo jitātmā /
GP12vamp__u:9174: kālo jyeṣṭhāmūlayoge mṛgāṅgaḥ kurukṣetraṃ puṇyadeśaṃ prasiddham //
GP12vamp__u:9175: kiṃ vā devo 'smadvidhairbuddhihīnaiḥ śikṣāpanīyaḥ sādhu vāsādhu caiva /
GP12vamp__u:9176: svayaṃ śrutīnāmapi cādikarttā vyāpya sthitaḥ sadasad yo jagad vai //
GP12vamp__u:9177: kṛtvā pramāṇaṃ svayaseva hīnaṃ padatrayaṃ yācitavān bhuvaśca /
GP12vamp__u:9178: kiṃ tvaṃ na gṛhṇāsi jagattrayaṃ bho rūpeṇa lokatrayavanditena //
GP12vamp__u:9179: nātrāścaryaṃ yajjagad vai samagraṃ kramatrayaṃ naiva pūrṇaṃ tavādya /
GP12vamp__u:9180: krameṇa tvaṃ laṅghayituṃ samartho līlāmetāṃ kṛtavān lokanātha //
GP12vamp__u:9181: pramāṇahīnāṃ svayameva kṛtvā vasuṃdharāṃ mādhava padmanābha /
GP12vamp__u:9182: viṣṇo na badhnāsi baliṃ na dūre prabhuryadevecchati tatkaroti //
GP12vamp__u:9188: teṣāṃ vaica hetusaṃyuktaṃ śṛṇu pratyuttaraṃ mama // VamP_65.47 //
GP12vamp__u:9190: dehi mahyaṃ pramāṇena tadetat samanuṣṭhitam // VamP_65.48 //
GP12vamp__u:9191: kiṃ na vetti pramāṇaṃ me balistava pitāsura /
GP12vamp__u:9192: prāyacchad yena niḥśaṅkaṃ mamānantaṃ kramatrayam // VamP_65.49 //
GP12vamp__u:9195: tasmād yanmama bāleya tvatpitrāmbu kare mahat /
GP12vamp__u:9196: dattaṃ tenāyuretasya kalpaṃ yāvad bhaviṣyati // VamP_65.51 //
GP12vamp__u:9198: sāvarṇike ca saṃprāpte balirindro bhaviṣyati // VamP_65.52 //
GP12vamp__u:9203: sutalaṃ nāma pātālaṃ vasa tatra nirāmayaḥ // VamP_65.54 //
GP12vamp__u:9205: sutale vasato nātha mama bhogāḥ kuto 'vyayāḥ /

GP12vamp__u:9538: tattadvi deyaṃ prītyarthaṃ devadevāya cakriṇe // VamP_68.36 //
GP12vamp__u:9539: yaḥ kārayenmandiraṃ keśavasya puṇyāṃllokān sa jayecchāśvatān vai /
GP12vamp__u:9540: dattvārāmān puṣpaphalābhipannān bhogān bhuṅkte kāmātaḥ ślāghanīyān //
GP12vamp__u:9541: pitāmahasya purataḥ kulānyaṣṭau tu yāni ca /
GP12vamp__u:9543: imāś ca pitaro daitya gāthā gāyanti yoginaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9545: api naḥ sa kule kaścid viṣṇubhakto bhaviṣyati /
GP12vamp__u:9548: sammārjanaṃ ca dharmātmā kariṣyati ca bhaktitaḥ // VamP_68.41 //
GP12vamp__u:9549: api naḥ santatau jāto dhvajaṃ cakeśavamandire /
GP12vamp__u:9554: cakārāyatanaṃ bhūmyāṃ khyaṃ ca limpatāsura // VamP_68.44 //
GP12vamp__u:9567: itthaṃ sa nṛpatiḥ kṛtvā śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9575: vibhave sati devasya prīṇanaṃ kuru cakriṇaḥ // VamP_68.54 //
GP12vamp__u:9576: evaṃ kriyāyogaratasya te 'dya nūnaṃ murāriḥ śubhado bhaviṣyati /
GP12vamp__u:9577: narā na sīdanti bale samāśritā vibhuṃ jagannāthamanantamacyutam //
GP12vamp__u:9579: ityevamuktvā vacanaṃ ditīśvaro vairocanaṃ satyamanuttamaṃ hi /
GP12vamp__u:9581: gate hi tasmin mudite pitāmahe balerbabhau mandiraminduvarṇam /
GP12vamp__u:9582: mahendraśilpipravaro 'tha keśavaṃ sa kārayāmāsa mahāmahīyān // VamP_68.57
GP12vamp__u:9584: kriyā mahātmā yavaśarkarādyāṃ baliṃ cakārāpratimāṃ madhudruhaḥ //
GP12vamp__u:9586: geyaṃ sa dharmyaśravaṇaṃ ca dhīmān paurāṇikairvipravarairakārayat //
GP12vamp__u:9589: sūryāyutābhaṃ musalaṃ pragṛhya nighnan sa duṣṭāriyūthāpālān /
GP12vamp__u:9590: dvāri sthito na pradadau praveśaṃ prākāragupte balino gṛhe tu //
GP12vamp__u:9591: dvāri sthite dhātari rakṣapāle nārāyaṇe sarvaguṇābhirāme /
GP12vamp__u:9593: sa evamāste 'surarāḍ balistu samarcayan vai haripādapaṅkajau /
GP12vamp__u:9594: sasmāra nityaṃ haribhaṣitāni sa tasya jāto vinayāṅkuśastu // VamP_68.63 //
GP12vamp__u:9595: idaṃ ca vṛttaṃ sa papāṭha daityarāṭ smaran suvākyāni guroḥ śubhāni /
GP12vamp__u:9596: tathyāni pathyāni paratra ceha pitāmahasyendrasamasya vīraḥ // VamP_68.64
GP12vamp__u:9597: ye vṛddhavākyāni samācaranti śrutvā duruktānyapi pūrvatastu /
GP12vamp__u:9598: snigdhāni paścānnavanītaśuddhā modanti te nātra vicāramasti // VamP_68.65
GP12vamp__u:9600: vṛddhavākyaiṣadhā nūnaṃ kurvanti kila nirviṣam // VamP_68.66 //
GP12vamp__u:9602: yā tṛptirjāyate puṃsā somapāne kutastathā // VamP_68.67 //
GP12vamp__u:9603: āpattau patitānāṃ yeṣāṃ vṛddhā na santi śāstāraḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9604: te śocyā banadhūnāṃ jīvanto 'pīha mṛtatulyāḥ // VamP_68.68 //
GP12vamp__u:9606: yeṣāṃ mokṣyitāre vai teṣāṃ sāntirna vidyate // VamP_68.69 //
GP12vamp__u:9609: tasmād yo vṛddhavākyāni śṛṇuyād vidadhāti ca /
GP12vamp__u:9610: sa sadyaḥ siddhimāpnoti yathā vairocano baliḥ // VamP_68.71 //
GP12vamp__u:9613: etanmayā puṇyatamaṃ purāṇaṃ tubhyaṃ tathā nārada kīrtitaṃ vai /
GP12vamp__u:9614: śrutvā ca kīrtyā parayā sameto bhaktyā ca viṣṇoḥ padamabhyupaiti //
GP12vamp__u:9617: na tasya rogā jāyante na viṣaṃ cābhicārikam /
GP12vamp__u:9618: śarīre ca kule brahman yaḥ śruṇoti ca vāmanam // VamP_69.3 //
GP12vamp__u:9619: śraṇoti nityaṃ vidhivacca bhaktyā saṃpūjayan yaḥ praṇataśca viṣṇum /
GP12vamp__u:9620: sa cāśvamedhasya sadakṣiṇasya phalaṃ samagraṃ parihinapāpaḥ // VamP_69.4
GP12vamp__u:9621: prāpnoti dattasya suvarṇabhūmeraśvasya gonāgarathasya caiva nārī naraścāpi ca pādamekaṃ śṛṇvan śuciḥ puṇyatamaḥ pṛthivyām /
GP12vamp__u:9622: 69.5 snāne kṛte tīrthavare supuṇye gaṅgājale naimiṣapuṣkare vā /
GP12vamp__u:9623: kokāmukhe yat pravadanti viprāḥ prayāgamāsādya ca māghamāse // VamP_69.6
GP12vamp__u:9624: sa tatphalaṃ prāpya ca vāmanasya saṃkīrtayan nānyamanāḥ padaṃ hi /
GP12vamp__u:9625: gacchenmayā nārada te 'dya coktaṃ yad rājasūyasya phalaṃ prayacchet //
GP12vamp__u:9626: yad bhūmiloke suralokalabhye mahatsukhaṃ prāpya naraḥ samagram /
GP12vamp__u:9627: prāpanoti cāsya śravaṇānmaharṣe sautrāmaṇernāsti ca saṃśayo me //
GP12vamp__u:9628: ratnasya dānasya ca yatphalaṃ bhaved yatsūryasya cendorgrahaṇe ca rāhoḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9629: annasya dānena phalaṃ yathoktaṃ bubhukṣite vipravare ca sāgnike //
GP12vamp__u:9631: devāgniviprarṣirate ca pitroḥ śuśruṣake bhrātari jyeṣṭhasāmne /
GP12vamp__u:9632: yattatphalaṃ saṃpravadanti devāḥ sa tat phalaṃ labhate cāsya pāṭhāt //
GP12vamp__u:9633: caturdaśaṃ vāmanamāhuragryaṃ śrute ca yasyāghacayāśca nāśam /
GP12vamp__u:9634: prayānti nāstyatra ca saṃśayo me mahānti pāpānyapi nāradāśu // VamP_69.11
GP12vamp__u:9636: sarvapāpāni naśyanti vāmanasya sadā mude // VamP_69.12 //
GP12vamp__u:9637: idaṃ rahasyaṃ paramaṃ tavoktaṃ na vācyametaddharibhaktivarjite /
GP12vamp__u:9639: namo namaḥ kāraṇa vāmanāya nityaṃ yo vadenniyataṃ dvijaḥ /
GP12vamp__u:9640: tasya viṣṇuḥ padaṃ mokṣaṃ dadāti surapūjitaḥ // VamP_69.14 //
GP12vamp__u:9642: vittaśāṭhyaṃ na kartavyaṃ kurvan śravaṇanāśakam // VamP_69.15 //
